verses.name: Psalms 119:23
verses.text: Princes also did sit and speak against me: but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.

verses.name: Psalms 119:24
verses.text: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.

verses.name: Psalms 119:25
verses.text: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.

verses.name: Psalms 119:26
verses.text: I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: teach me thy statutes.

verses.name: Psalms 119:27
verses.text: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.

verses.name: Psalms 119:28
verses.text: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.

verses.name: Psalms 119:29
verses.text: Remove from me the way of lying: and grant me thy law graciously.
